Questions.Label: What is your organisation's process for initial assessments to recognise prior learning?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • review personal learning records
  • review relevant education (including training, qualifications and work experience already achieved)
  • identify and analyse skill gaps
  • use apprenticeships to address any skill gaps

Find out more about initial assessments (opens in a new window or tab).

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us what your organisation's process is for initial assessments to recognise prior learning

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Questions.Label: What is your organisation's process to assess English and maths qualifications for apprentices?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • review existing English and maths qualifications
  • measure these qualifications against entry level requirements for apprenticeships
  • identify and analyse any learning gaps
  • identify no further learning requirements for English and maths

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us what your organisation's process is to assess English and maths qualifications for apprentices

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less
